html:
thou/thee. The Lord refers to his covenant people.

call a nation that thou knowest not. The covenant people will take the gospel to the Gentiles, who will help take the word throughout the world. Compare this phrase to Ps. 18:43: "Thou has made me the head of the heathen: a people whom I have not known shall serve me."

glorified thee. The New International Version renders this "endowed you with splendor."
